code: import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddCard=()=>{const[customername,setName]=useState("");const[address,setAddress]=useState("");const[phone,setPhone]=useState("");const[present,setPresent]=useState("");const location=useLocation();const{_id}=location.state;const users={id:_id,customername:customername,address:address,phone:phone,present:present};const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const res=await axios.post("http://localhost:3001/payment",users);window.location.replace(res.data.url);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Payment methot.."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Name:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"customername",onChange:e=>{setName(e.target.value);}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Phone No:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"phone",onChange:e=>{setPhone(e.target.value);}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Address:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"address",onChange:e=>{setAddress(e.target.value);}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["present Address:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"present",onChange:e=>{setPresent(e.target.value);}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"submit"})]})]});};export default AddCard;
